segments.text: Looking in, I see a typical kitchen setup with cabinets and counters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying dishes, looking content in her routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh no, the sink is floodingâ€”water everywhere on the floor!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing in it, and if she slips, it could be bad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool the boy is on looks like it's about to give way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching so high into that cookie jar, one hand with a plate too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there, expecting her share of the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry they'll both end up hurt from this mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water damage to the wood cabinets will be awful if it keeps going.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden is calm, unaware of the indoor panic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should turn around right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could turn into a real emergency so quickly.
segments.speaker: PAR
